info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 6:48PM EDT until June 25 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sterling Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Shenandoah County in northwestern Virginia... Central Hardy County in eastern West Virginia... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 648 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Moorefield, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. * Locations impacted include... Basye-Bryce Mountain, Mathias, Basye, Perry, Lost City, Lost River and Jerome. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
